solution_line_template: In {years_in_future} years, Kilee will be {kilee_current_age} years + {years_in_future} years = {kilee_age_in_future} years.
In ten years, Cornelia will be {age_multiplier} * {kilee_age_in_future} years = <<{age_multiplier}*{kilee_age_in_future}={cornelia_age_in_future}>>{cornelia_age_in_future} years old.
Cornelia is currently {cornelia_age_in_future} years - {years_in_future} years = <<{cornelia_age_in_future}-{years_in_future}={cornelia_current_age}>>{cornelia_current_age} years old
